explains: n. 膝上型计算机，便携式电脑（=laptop computer）
wordGroup: laptop computer 手提电脑；膝上型电脑

sentences.en: She used to work at her laptop until four in the morning.
sentences.cn: 她以前经常在笔记本电脑前工作到凌晨4点钟。

sentences.en: It is significantly more compact than any comparable laptop, with no loss in functionality.
sentences.cn: 它比其它任何一台同类的笔记本电脑都更便于携带，并且在功能性上无任何差别。

sentences.en: But luckily, my laptop was there.
sentences.cn: 但幸运的是，我的笔记本电脑在那里。
